CustomField.defaultValue: "This record has been re-assigned, as the original owner is OOO."
CustomField.description: This content of this field will be used to stamp the message on the re-assigned record. Demen S. 27th Oct. 2020.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please add your Post Message. Please note, Chatter is required for feed messages.
CustomField.label: Feed Post Message
